predicate.note: Frames file for 'jingle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2

roleset.name: make noise like a little bell

example.name: agentive
example.text: While people were jingling their change, the LDP politicians were caught in scandals.

example.name: more commonly ergative
example.text: John's doorbell jingled, but he ignored it.
